byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and KEN BELSON

abstract: New Jersey Judge Michael Donio dismisses domestic violence charges against NFL running back Ray Rice after he meet terms of his pretrial intervention; other football news noted
lead_paragraph: A judge dismissed the charges on Thursday after the Atlantic County prosecutor said Rice, a former Ravens running back, had completed the terms of his pretrial intervention.

headline.main: Ray Rice Domestic Violence Charges Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Rice Has Domestic Violence Charges Dismissed

snippet: A judge dismissed the charges on Thursday after the Atlantic County prosecutor said Rice, a former Ravens running back, had completed the terms of his pretrial intervention.
